mapper.select: SELECT a.sanction_no ,a.sanction_member_no ,a.sanction_kind_no ,a.sanction_title ,a.sanction_content ,a.sanction_start_date ,a.sanction_end_date ,a.sanction_point ,b.member_id as memberId FROM sanction a, member b WHERE a.sanction_member_no = b.member_no
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cast(SUBSTRING(sanction_no,10) as decimal)), 0) FROM sanction
SELECT sanction_kind_no as sanctionKindNo ,sanction_kind as sanctionKind FROM sanction_kind ORDER BY sanction_kind_no ASC
SELECT member_no as memberNo ,member_id as memberId FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cast(SUBSTRING(inquire_no,9) as decimal)), 0) FROM inquire

SELECT a.complain_no as complainNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.complain_answer_title as complainAnswerTitle ,a.complain_answer_content as complainAnswerContent ,a.complain_answer_date as complainAnswerDate ,b.complain_title as complainTitle FROM complain_answer a, complain b WHERE a.complain_no = #{complainNo} AND a.complain_no = b.complain_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM complain_answer WHERE complain_no = #{complainNo}

SELECT a.complain_no as complainNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.complain_title as complainTitle ,a.complain_content as complainContent ,a.complain_date as complainDate ,b.member_id as memberId FROM complain a, member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no

SELECT a.complain_no as complainNo ,a.complain_member_no as complainMemberNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.complain_title as complainTitle ,a.complain_content as complainContent ,a.complain_date as complainDate ,b.member_id as memberId FROM complain a, member b WHERE a.member_no = #{memeber_no} AND a.member_no = b.member_no
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(cast(SUBSTRING(complain_no, 10) as decimal)), 0) FROM complain

SELECT a.inquire_no as inquireNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.inquire_answer_title as inquireAnswerTitle ,a.inquire_answer_content as inquireAnswerContent ,a.inquire_answer_date as inquireAnswerdate ,b.inquire_title as inquireTitle FROM inquire_answer a, inquire b WHERE a.inquire_no = #{inquireNo} AND a.inquire_no = b.inquire_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquire_answer WHERE inquire_no = #{inquireNo}

SELECT a.inquire_no as inquireNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.inquire_title as inquireTitle ,a.inquire_content as inquireContent ,a.inquire_date as inquireDate ,b.member_id as memberId FROM inquire a, member b WHERE a.member_no = b.member_no

SELECT a.inquire_no as inquireNo ,a.member_no as memberNo ,a.inquire_title as inquireTitle ,a.inquire_content as inquireContent ,a.inquire_date as inquireDate ,b.member_id as memberId FROM inquire a, member b WHERE a.member_no = #{memberNo} AND a.member_no = b.member_no
